Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Repeals part A of chapter 60 of the laws of 2016, which provides for the transition of the school tax relief property tax exemption to a personal income tax credit
Summary: Repeals provisions relating to the transition of the school tax relief property tax exemption to a personal income tax credit.
ActClause: AN ACT to repeal part A of chapter 60 of the laws of 2016 amending the real property tax law and the tax law relating to transitioning the school tax relief (STAR) exemption into a personal income tax credit, relating thereto
